name: Goodwill Industries (SF, San Mateo, Marin)
description: Accepts donations of clothing, electronics, furniture, housewares, books, and sporting goods; proceeds fund job training programs; multiple donation centers available
fullDescription: Goodwill Industries operates thrift stores and donation centers throughout the Bay Area, with proceeds funding job training and employment programs for people facing barriers.
whatTheyOffer:
- Accept clothing donations
- Accept electronics and furniture
- Accept housewares and books
- Accept sporting goods
- Multiple donation centers
- Proceeds fund job training
howToGetIt:
1. Find nearest donation center
2. Bring gently used items
3. Drop off during open hours
4. Or shop thrift stores
5. Support job training programs
6. Get donation receipt
keywords: Goodwill, thrift store, donate clothes, donate electronics, donate furniture, job training, employment program, San Francisco, San Mateo, Marin, charity shop, secondhand
